The Africa Report bụ magazin Bekee na-ebipụta kwa nkeji iri na ise nke na-elekwasị anya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akụ na ụba Afrịka.
N'ịbụ nke Jeune Afrique Media Group nke dị na Paris mepụtara na 2005, Patrick Smith nke Africa Confidential dezigharịrị The Africa Report. Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ebipụtakwa magazin Jeune Afrique kwa ọnwa.
A mụrụ ya site na ọchịchọ nke Jeune Afrique Media Group ịzụlite onwe ya n'ụwa Anglo-Saxon, The Africa Report malitere ebe nrụọrụ weebụ na 2019 iji nweta ọhụụ ma ghọọ mgbasa ozi na-ezo aka na Africa
Ọ na-ekpuchi akụkọ akụ na ụba, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke kọntinent ahụ.

Na-egosipụta akụkọ site na ngalaba na ilekwasị anya na mba, mbipụta ọ bụla sitere n'aka otu nchịkọta akụkọ kwụụrụ onwe ya nke Nicholas Norbrook, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Africa Report kemgbe e kere ya.
Na ihe karịrị otu nde ndị na-agụ ya kwa ọnwa, The Africa Report mejupụtara paywall na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ akụkọ ya na 2021 iji gbakwunye mbipụta mbipụta ya nke nkeji iri na ise.
Africa Report meriri na 2006, 2007 na 2012 Diageo Africa Business Reporting Award maka Best Media yana onyinye 2007 maka Best Published Feature.
Mgbe onye guzobere otu ahụ bụ Bechir Ben Yahmed nwụsịrị na 3 Mee 2021, njikwa nke The African Report nọ n'okpuru nlekọta nke Nicholas Norbroook.
Danielle Ben Yahmed, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ
Laura-Angela Bagnetto, Onye nchịkọta akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
